title: Dino Gnar appreciation!
body:
Can we get some love for this scary... cute... cuddly... dangerous.. Dino! 
<3
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-rV40V3lBY2c/U9gJ6OrXXDI/AAAAAAAAUuo/WbeJqb3yX9s/s1600/dinao.jpg
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Iwm1hTZvCAc/U9qjAfgXJwI/AAAAAAAAU_A/kR0L_XjDaK4/s1600/dinaur.jpg
Isn't it just adorable/terrifying!
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-i3QyUKsWgTI/U9vgJPHg1lI/AAAAAAAAEKg/x8WOq4U3xjY/s1600/Gnar_Splash_1.jpg

Edit: Splash Added!

replies.body:
I remember the first time I saw a sketch for this and people were like "I don't know if players will get it, it's too confusing, why is he wearing a dinosaur onesie?" and I (and a whole bunch of other people) was like "SHUT UP HE'S WEARING A DINOSAUR ONESIE IF WE DON'T MAKE THIS SKIN WE WILL HAVE FAILED AS A COMPANY".

Glad we did not fail.
10/10 best skin to date, will spend food money on it

> 10/10 best skin to date, will spend food money on it

Lets call it worth at the end of the day....
never waste food money...
One of those moment where one realizes that if something's cute enough it could destroy the world......lol
you back to those people and tell them players understood why he is wearing a dino onesie, players are not confused, and YES you did not fail Rito, you did not fail.
Can we see the Sion relaunch kit or the Warwick kit and put it on PBE?
Rather, it is the greatest success.
Ya, I get it tho. He is prehistoric and so is Dinosaurs. It makes sense while still being SO ADORABLE!
Would give up my pinky for it. Lately the skins are too cool. Soul Stealer, Mechas, Hazmat. Riot you're going the right direction. I have spent over a k on this game and ill spend more.
Gonna just leave this here: http://31.media.tumblr.com/7mrjcu2Dvqt3k3cozCMo6ekPo1_500.jpg rawr
http://i59.tinypic.com/2iu822s.jpg
lol
If Riot goes through with skin recolors, I'll buy this, make it black and pretend to be Godzilla.

OMG YES! 
A black and red Mega Gnar would be so amazing >.<
Woah woah woah, when did skin recolours as an option get mentioned anywhere? This sounds awesome, would love a source on this.
I love this skin, but I'm still VERY MUCH waiting for Gnarwhal.

Just tried the skin, at first when I saw Dino Gnar would be the release skin I was disappointed.

But wow, there is so much win/cute in this skin that, wow.

http://youtu.be/Y_nSwh2WjAM?t=57s

MOMMY!!!!
Splash has been added. :)
This skin is amazing.  I haven't liked many of the release skins recently.  It's nobody's fault, they haven't been bad, just not my cup of tea.  But this... wow.  So adorable.
This is also a gem about a dinosaur costume http://hyperboleandahalf.blogspot.com/
This skin looks great. Awesome theme and execution. Thanks Riot.
aww dino gnar so cute :) I wonder when hes gonna come out?
does anyone know?
Usually all new champions come out in the next patch. But their release is stalled if they are having problems or they aren't ready yet.
Its soooooo cute...this skin reminds me a little of Reptar from Rugrats. Anyone else think so?
I'm not even going to be playing Gnar (he doesn't fit my playstyle) but he's too adorable for me to not buy and now this skin... **So **much money on a champion I won't play!
Only bundle to its its release i would have bought.
Very nicely put together skin in my opinion, his second form looks awesome.
This Mega-Gnar's recall raises up and eats a helicopter ^.^
SO FRICKIN CUTE
This will be the first release skin I've bought in a very long time.  Just a fantastic piece.
dam i want to try him out
THERE IS NOTHING ABOUT THIS I DON'T LIKE!
one small question, did gnar stay in mega form when he died or did he switch to mini gnar?
he switches to mini gnar
Even his Mega-GNAR is Cute :D
So Much KAWAII
Ok.{{champion:33}}
Lol you could call it "Dinar" or something. (Dino+Gnar)
Its supposed to be like 'Dinosaur' but 'Dino-gnar' . just switch the n and s and it is the same. :/
